author: breser
msg: Work towards adding support for VS2010 and Neon to the build-svn-deps-win.pl script.
You can specify which version of Subversion you're building deps for via the
SVN_VER variable (e.g. SVN_VER=1.7.x).
NEON can be enabled to download/build if SVN_VER is older than 1.8 or NEON=1 is
set.
* tools/dev/build-svn-deps-win.pl
(VCUPGRADE, PYTHON, NEON_VER, NEON_URL, PROJREF_URL, NEON_FILE, PROJREF_FILE,
SVN_VER, NEON, SVN_VER): New variables.
(set_svn_ver_defaults, check_vs_ver): New functions.
(download_dependencies): Download python script that fixes project references
and neon if configured to.
(extract_dependencies): Extract neon if configured to.
(upgrade_solution): Handle an interactive conversion where needed.
(build_httpd): Use interactive conversion when building under VS2010, adjust
workarounds to httpd build to be VS version dependent.
(main): Check the Visual Studio Version.
